title: Design, synthesis, and anti-mycobacterial evaluation of 1,8-naphthyridine-3-carbonitrile analogues
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22676-22689
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04262J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yogesh Mahadu Khetmalis, Singarapalle Shobha, Adinarayana Nandikolla, Ala Chandu, Sankaranarayanan Murugesan, Muthyala Murali Krishna Kumar, Kondapalli Venkata Gowri Chandra Sekhar
Twenty-eight compounds, viz., 1,8-naphthyridine-3-carbonitrile (ANC and ANA) derivatives, were designed and synthesized through a molecular hybridization approach. The designed compounds were evaluated for anti-TB activity against Mtb H37Rv strain.
